DialogComponent.Name: StreamsRaster

DialogComponent.Name: Power
DialogComponent.Description: Exponent parameter used during the MDInf Flow Accumulation tool

DialogComponent.Name: outputType
DialogComponent.Description: Output type used during the MDInf Flow Accumulation tool
DialogComponent.ListItems: Specific catchment area (sca), Total catchment area, Number of upslope grid cells

DialogComponent.Name: CAThreshold
DialogComponent.Description: Non-dispersive threshold value used during the MDInf Flow Accumulation tool

DialogComponent.Name: FlowAccumTotal
DialogComponent.Description: Enter the name of the Total Flow Accumulation output raster here

DialogComponent.Description: Enter the name of the Right Flow Accumulation output raster here

DialogComponent.Name: FlowAccumLeft
